'''19w38b''' is the sixth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.15]], released on September 18, 2019,<ref name="19w38b">{{snap|19w38b|September 18, 2019}}</ref> which fixes a critical issue from [[Java Edition 19w38a|the previous snapshot]] involving breaking blocks.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=19w38b
|;old
|997|Clouds are transparent when viewed from above or inside but not when viewed from underneath.
|;prev
|161268|{{cd|java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException}} while tesselating block model; game crashes when breaking a block.
|161312|Breaking blocks in survival mode does not show the breaking animation.
}}</onlyinclude>
